name: $capture-display
desc: Render the item only when capturing data.

name: $capture
desc: Render the item only when displaying a completed form.

name: $display
desc: Render the item only when displaying a completed form and the item has been answered (or has child items that have been answered).

name: $display-non-empty
desc: Render the item when capturing data or when displaying a completed form and the item has been answered (or has child items that have been answered).
